head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DE MARTIN, PETER R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DE MARTIN, PETER R.

block.p: De MARTIN-Peter R. Son of the late Peter DeMartin of Brooklyn, NY and the late Charlotte Dessilla of Cliffside, NJ, on September 30, 2000. Funeral and interment at Madonna Cemetery, Fort Lee, NJ will be private. In lieu of flowers, donations appreciated ''In memory of Peter R. DeMartin'' to Cabrini Hospice, attn: Mary Cooke, 227 East 19th Street, NYC 10003.
